item.description:
Join Social Fun for 2 meetups in 1!

Shall we name it "Reverse Happy Hour"? That isn't the name Grendels gives it, but the food is half price with the purchase of a (full price) $3 drink, so doesn't that amount to the same thing?

It is a good idea to get to Grendels by 5:30 for prompt service and seating, because the place fills up fast, gets busy and gets louder! Please bring cash to make it easier on waitstaff! Last half price menu orders by 6:30 PM please, so we can wrap up the tab after 7:00!

Please remember to add 25% to the basic price to cover the tax and tip (added to the final tab).
item.how_to_find_us: There are 3 big tables at Grendels, one in every of three corners.
item.name: Grendels Den Reverse Happy Hour
